Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.events

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BuildBlockEvent
    Event: Player wants to make a Construction with a Worker.
    CardsChoosingEvent
    Event: Challenger has chosen Cards for the upcoming game.
    CardSelectionEvent
    Event: Player has selected a Card.
    GameResumingResponseEvent
    Event: Player wants to resume a saved game.
    MoveWorkerEvent
    Event: Player wants to make a Movement with a Worker.
    PlaceWorkerEvent
    Event: Player has placed a Worker.
    QuitEvent
    Event: Player wants to quit the game.
    RemoveBlockEvent
    Event: Player wants to remove a block.
    RemoveWorkerEvent
    Event: Player wants to remove a Worker.
    SelectWorkerEvent
    Event: Player has selected a Worker to make a move.
    SetNicknameEvent
    Event: Player has submitted his/her nickname.
    SetPlayersNumberEvent
    Event: Player has submitted the number of Players for the upcoming game.
    SetStartPlayerEvent
    Event: Challenger has chosen the Start Player for this game.
    TurnStatusChangeEvent
    Event: Player wants to change his/her Turn Status (to make a Movement or a Construction).
    UndoActionEvent
    Event: Players wants to undo an action.
    ViewRequestDataEvent
    Event: View has requested general game data.
